key.name: enable-auto-zoning
key.description: Automatically tile windows when moved into a defined zone.

key.name: zones
key.description: A JSON string representing an array of zone objects. Each object: {monitorIndex: number, name: string, x: number, y: number, width: number, height: number}

key.name: restore-original-size-on-untile
key.description: When a window is moved out of a zone, restore its original size and position.

key.name: tile-new-windows
key.description: Automatically tile newly opened windows if they fall into a zone.

key.name: highlight-on-hover
key.description: Visually highlight a zone when dragging a window over it.
